title: Trying to reconnect status after log in
body:
Dear Support,

i have a problem for 3 days, when i log in the game, i get the message: Trying to reconnect. 
I see my friendlist, and menu at the background, but i have to wait 5-10-15 mins, when this message disappear, and can join a game.
But i didnt see the quests, and when im in the champ select screen, i cant choose mastery ( only blank option) .

My internet is perfect, the game repaired, then reinstalled, but i get same message every day.

Can u help me pls? 

Thx a lot,
Best regard
P071

replies.body: It sounds like your client is really having some problems getting a solid connection with our servers if you happen to see that reconnect message over and over.  It makes even more sense that you've lost your connection when you mentioned not being able to change masteries since that data needs to be pulled from the servers. Check out our [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for some ways you can flush your DNS and adjust your port forwarding and let me know how that works.

nice copy and paste, how about you guys admit that it isnt a connection issue and that its to do with the patch. Protector just said that his internet is perfect and yet you say its a connection issue. Do you guys actually pay attention to the help and support comments because it really doesnt seem like it. I've seen this exact same reply on atleast 5 different discussions, even when the internet connection of the first commenter is perfect.
hi where did you find the tool "Leatrix Latency Fix" on mac? i can't find it

Bumping this. It's been two months already still nothing changed. Logging in is a pain. Please riot look into this. There hasn't been any problem before the URF Patch, something must have gone wrong. Many people have this issue...
Exactly the same going on with my connection. Looking for a straightforward answer to solve this problem rather than a Clipboard reply !

I have the same issue with the new client... I have never ever before have this problem but with the new client. My connection is perfect and stable i keep stable 13-14 ping anytime i play.  The only problem comes when I log into to game i get this trying to recconect message for about 10 mints then it disapear and i have no any issue ever after untill i quit the client i log in again. Any time i log in its 10 mins wait. It is very anoying with the fact my connection is perfect.

I am having the exact same issue, as soon as i log into league it gives me the trying to reconnect pop up. and even when i join a game it wont load me into the game saying i cant connect to the server, yet my internet is good...? not sure what to do. please advise us on what to do, we are all here because we want to play league of legends. 

Cheers
Charles
